oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Peabody Hotel Exterior
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Peabody Hotel, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image of exterior.

– “Miss Irene Brignardello -- Aberdeen, Miss. -- R. F. D .#6 -- Herb was sleeping when -- I came home Sunday -- night, but I woke him. -- He sure must have -- enjoyed himself, judging from -- what he says. Recd your -- letter, but have not time to -- answer. Am leaving for lake -- to-morrow. -- Bro. Steve -- Karen came -- home Monday. -- looks fine.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Peabody Hotel; hotels; downtown;
